item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: This is some test text of the blogdown knit function to git # here's a simple plot. x <- c(1,2,3,4,5) y <- c(2,4,8,16,32) plot(x,y) Including Plots You can also embed plots. See Figure 1 for example: par(mar = c(0, 1, 0, 1)) pie( c(280, 60, 20), c('Sky', 'Sunny side of pyramid', 'Shady side of pyramid'), col = c('#0292D8', '#F7EA39', '#C4B632'), init.angle = -50, border = NA ) Figure 1: A fancy pie chart.
